content.title: A bit about us
content.description:
In the modern era, the web and social media is king. As a result, small businesses struggle to attract new customers. The main reason behind this is the soaring use of digital communications. Customers now typically go online to look for the best deals before even thinking about the high street.

Local businesses have been lagging behind for too long, it's time to get your business a strong online presence - and here at Digital Thunder, we want to help!

The services we offer include beautifully designed websites, branding, digital and physical advertising and social media marketing. We can provide any of these services with or without continous digital management, we leave it up to you to decide if you need us after delivery.

content.title: In-App CMS
content.description:
Fully control your trail data and create new trails directly from within the app.

Increase dwell time by adding relevant interactive material that your guests can engage with when at the location.

content.title: Real Time User Data
content.description:
With Digital Thunder you can be reactive to data trends by accessing up to the minute metrics on what your guests are doing.

Want to know where your guests go when its a sunny day?

Want to provide neighboring businesses with footfall metrics so they can optimise their opening hours?

With Digital Thunder these questions and many more can be answered.

content.title: Visitor Retention
content.description:
By engaging your guests with interactive material, unlocked by physically being at a location, Digital Thunder increases user engagement with you trail.

This leads to increased dwell time and ultimately, increased user spend.
